mapper.select: select g.group_id,g.group_name,g.created_at,g.owner_user_id, u.user_id,u.user_name,u.email from tb_groups g left join tb_users u on g.owner_user_id = u.user_id where g.group_id = #{groupId}
select g.group_id,g.group_name,g.created_at,g.owner_user_id, u.user_id,u.user_name,u.email from tb_groups g left join tb_users u on g.owner_user_id = u.user_id where g.owner_user_id = #{userId}

select g.*, u.user_id,u.user_name,u.email from tb_groups g inner join tb_group_members gm on g.group_id = gm.group_id left join tb_users u on g.owner_user_id = u.user_id where gm.user_id = #{userId} and gm.role = 'member'

select g.*, u.user_id,u.user_name,u.email from tb_groups g inner join tb_group_members gm on g.group_id = gm.group_id left join tb_users u on g.owner_user_id = u.user_id where gm.user_id = #{userId} and gm.role = 'admin'
